# --description-- Nest a second `div` within your existing `div`, and set the `class` to be `keys`. # --hints-- You should create a second `div` element. ```js const divDiv = document.querySelectorAll('div'); assert(divDiv?.length === 2); ``` Your new `div` element should be within your existing `div` element. ```js const div = document.querySelector('div'); assert(div?.children?.length === 1); assert(div?.children?.[0]?.localName === 'div'); ``` Your new `div` element should have the `class` set to `keys`. ```js const div = document.querySelector('div'); assert(div?.children?.[0]?.className === 'keys'); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html Piano
